meanings.sent1: She had oodles of toys in her room.
meanings.sent2: There were oodles of people at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party had oodles of balloons floating around.
meanings.sent4: The treasure chest was filled with oodles of gold coins.
meanings.sent5: The bakery displayed oodles of delicious pastries in the window.

meanings.definition: To have or possess a large amount or quantity
meanings.sent1: He oodles energy and enthusiasm in everything he does.
meanings.sent2: The garden oodles colorful flowers during spring.
meanings.sent3: The chef oodles talent in creating mouth-watering dishes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile oodles warmth and kindness.
meanings.sent5: The artist oodles creativity in every stroke of the brush.
